name: Master of Glass
description:
Are you ready for a new adventure?
Welcome to Master of Glass!
Shape glass, clay, metal and more as you wish.
Evolve your materials from worst to best.
To reach the most beautiful shape, YOUR help is needed!
Unique shapes with unique materials!
Create the most perfect with special colors, stickers, sprays, and much more!
Watch out for obstacles while playing the game
Improve yourself as you shape the materials, get ahead of your competitors.
Make special offers, earn money and diamonds as you shape them.
Here you are the master, the most beautiful works of art come out of your hands!
Get it and be the master!
